name: Hope Smiles Back
description: From blog to book: Eleni Zoe has been writing about her lousy love life for the last four years. Available on Amazon in June 2011, Hope Dies Last is a collection of short stories documenting those ill-fated affairs. Before its release we're sharing some of the most memorable lines from the book as gift cards. Get them for your sister, your best-friend or even yourself! Illustrated by Dimitra Tzanos and printed on a thick 350gsm, FSC credited paper stock, these cards have a light satin coating on the outside while the inside is left uncoated, making it easier for you to write your own message. Size 4.13" x 5.82" 105mm x 148mm Shipping every 3-4 days.
